attributes.action: Allow mobile caravans/static caravans to live in permanently on your own land.
attributes.additional_details: The acts that you can’t place a mobile caravan / static caravan on your own land to live in permanently isn’t a fair act of the government, many people wanna live other kind of live .
attributes.background: Allow mobile caravans/static caravans to live in permanently on your own land without any restrictions, let people to choose to live a healthier life .

rejection.details:
It is already possible for someone to live permanently in a static caravan or mobile home on their own land, subject to planning permission. These planning decisions are a matter for local authorities.

You could start a petition calling for static caravans and mobile homes on private properties to be exempt from requiring planning permission, if that's what you want to happen.
